entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
